```{r plot tree}

sample_data <- count(Species_info, species_name)
sample_data <- as.data.frame(sample_data)
sample_data2 <-mutate(sample_data, tip.label = species_name)
# sample_data2$Class <- as.factor(sample_data2$Class)
mytree$tip.label <- strip_ott_ids(mytree$tip.label, remove_underscores = TRUE)
# summary(sample_data2$tip.label)
# sample_data2$count <- as.numeric(sample_data2$count)
sample_data3 <- left_join(sample_data2, Species_info[,c("species_name","Class")], by = "species_name")
sample_data4 <- distinct(sample_data3, species_name, .keep_all = TRUE)
# is.na(sample_data4)
sample_data4$species_name<- as.factor(sample_data4$species_name)
sample_data4$tip.label <- as.factor(sample_data4$tip.label)

tree2 <- ggtree(mytree, layout = "circular", lwd = 0.75) %<+% sample_data4 + aes(color = Class) + geom_fruit(geom = geom_bar, mapping = aes(x = n, fill = tip.label), stat = "identity", col = "gray1", orientation = "y", axis.params = list(axis = "x",text.angle = -45, hjust = 0, text.size = 3), grid.params = list(alpha = 0.35),offset = 0.085, pwidth = 0.55, alpha = 0.8) + theme(legend.position = "none")
```
